markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crone's Cruelty](/Feats.aspx?ID=2340) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Filled with rancor and hate, you rend the minds of those who displease you. You can cast [_warp mind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) once per day as an occult innate spell.
name: Crone's Cruelty
